trans-unit.source: Indicates which property of a type is the XAML content property.
trans-unit.target: 指出類型的哪一個屬性是 XAML 內容屬性。

trans-unit.source: A XAML processor uses this information when processing XAML child elements of XAML representations of the attributed type.
trans-unit.target: XAML 處理器會在處理屬性化型別之 XAML 表示的 XAML 子項目時，使用這項資訊。

trans-unit.source: If the associated property of a <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute> is not of type `string` or `object`, a XAML processor attempts to identify a value conversion technique.
trans-unit.target: 如果相關聯的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute>的類型不是`string`或`object`，XAML 處理器會嘗試識別值的轉換技術。

trans-unit.source: The first check is for native type conversion, either of the XAML language primitives or of specific native conversions enabled by that particular XAML writer implementation.
trans-unit.target: 第一次檢查適用於原生類型轉換的 XAML 語言基本類型或特定的原生轉換啟用該特定的 XAML 寫入器實作。

trans-unit.source: The next step is to look for a type converter.
trans-unit.target: 下一步是尋找型別轉換子。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET implementations, a type converter is identified based on <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> on either the member level or type level definition that applies.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET 實作中，類型轉換器會識別根據<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>任一成員層級或型別層級定義上套用。

trans-unit.source: If no value conversion can be identified, a XAML object writer typically throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以識別沒有值的轉換，則 XAML 物件寫入器通常擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: In order to accept more than a single object element as content, the type of the XAML content property must be supportable as a collection type.
trans-unit.target: 為了接受多個單一物件項目，做為內容，XAML 內容屬性的型別必須可支援當做集合型別。

trans-unit.source: Because of the `Inherited=true` declaration of the attribute, a value for a <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute> normally applies a content property designation to all derived classes as well.
trans-unit.target: 因為`Inherited=true`屬性的值的宣告<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute>通常適用於所有衍生類別的內容屬性指定。

trans-unit.source: Applying an empty <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute> enables a derived class to remove a declaration of a content property attribute by a base class (and to note that the class has no content property).
trans-unit.target: 套用空<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute>可讓衍生的類別來移除的內容屬性宣告的基底類別 （和注意該類別會有任何內容屬性）。

trans-unit.source: Applying a differently named <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute> replaces the inherited <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute> with the new one.
trans-unit.target: 套用不同的具名<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute>取代繼承<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute>以新的。

trans-unit.source: In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase, and also had a parallel implementation in Windows Communication Foundation (WCF).
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個類別會存在於 WindowsBase 中，WPF 專屬組件，而且也有平行實作 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF)。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 4.0, <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute> is in the System.Xaml assembly.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 4.0，<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute>位於 System.Xaml 組件中。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。

trans-unit.source: WPF Usage Notes
trans-unit.target: WPF 使用注意事項

trans-unit.source: An example of a class in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) that uses the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute> is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> class inherits from.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 使用的類別範例<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute>是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>、 哪些<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>類別繼承自。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is the content property set by the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性是設定的內容屬性<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is instantiated in XAML, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> will be set to the element that is between the start and end button tags.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>在 XAML 中，具現化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>會設定為開始和結束按鈕標籤之間的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a class named `Film` that has a <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute> applied.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立名為類別`Film`具有<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute>套用。

trans-unit.source: The property named `Title` is indicated as the content property.
trans-unit.target: 具名屬性`Title`指示為內容屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Because of the `Inherited=true` declaration of the attribute, a value for a <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute> normally applies a content property designation to all derived classes as well.
trans-unit.target: 因為`Inherited=true`屬性的值的宣告<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute>通常適用於所有衍生類別的內容屬性指定。

trans-unit.source: Using this signature, or applying an empty <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute>, enables a derived class to remove a declaration of a content property attribute by a base class (and note that the class has no content property).
trans-unit.target: 使用此簽章，或套用空<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute>，讓您在移除的內容屬性宣告由基底類別 （並記下該類別會有任何內容屬性） 衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: The property name for the property that is the content property.
trans-unit.target: 本身為內容屬性之屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute" /> class, by using the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的名稱，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ContentPropertyAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Assuming CLR backing, the provided `name` should match the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> of the relevant property in the CLR type system.
trans-unit.target: 假設 CLR 支援，提供`name`應符合<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>中 CLR 的相關屬性的型別系統。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the property that is the content property.
trans-unit.target: 取得內容屬性之屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property that is the content property.
trans-unit.target: 表示內容屬性之屬性的名稱。
